place.name: BRIGSLEY
place.gazetteerText: BRIGSLEY, a parish in Caistor district, Lincoln; 3 miles WSW of Holton-le-Clay r. station, and 5 S by W of Great Grimsby. Post Town, Waltham, under Grimsby. Acres, 860. Real property, £1,647. Pop., 152. Houses, 35. The property is subdivided. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Lincoln. Value, £60. Patron, Southwell Collegiate Church. The church is good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
